arguments.response_text:
Hi, my name is Hatem, and I came to the United States in 2018 to do my PhD in linguistics.
I finished my PhD six months ago, and two years ago, a little bit over two years ago, I met this beautiful...
Tell them where you're from.
I'm from Iran, and yes, so we got married in October, and since then I've been living in Chicago.
arguments.response_summary: The response introduces the speaker, Hatem, and mentions his background coming to the United States for his PhD and his current residence in Chicago.
arguments.matched_prompt: How did you and your family build a life in Chicago?
